combatants_list_description: Displays the list of combatants part of the scene.
data_privacy_content:
This page does utilize the browser's local storage to locally save the scene and user preferences (like language settings) in the user's browser. This is done, so that the user does not lose information when closing the browser application. If you wish to delete this information simply clear your browser's cached web data.

No data is send to any remote server and no other user related data is processed by this page.
download_scene_description: Lets you download the current scene as a JSON file.
edit_scene_description: Toggles edit mode to change the scene name and combatants list.
run_scene_description:
Ends edit mode and runs the scene, ordering all combatants by ascending initiative. Clicking a combatant in run mode allows you to choose a number of ticks to add to the combatant's initiative value, followed by a reordering.

You can re-enter edit mode at any time.
upload_scene_description: Lets you choose a scene to load that was previously saved to your device.

change_theme.title: Day/Night Mode
change_theme.content: Toggle between day and night mode.

overview.title: Tick Selection Dialog
overview.content: Here you can select the ticks to add or subtract, as well as special combat states like expecting, waiting, or incapitated.

scene.empty_combatants_list: Click Edit Scene and add some combatants.
